CustomField.formula: IF( Activity_Status__c = 'Neglected' ,IMAGE('/resource/ActvityStatusKPI/Red.gif', 'Neglected'), IF( Activity_Status__c = 'At Risk' ,IMAGE('/resource/ActvityStatusKPI/yellow.gif', 'At Risk'), IF( Activity_Status__c = 'Current' ,IMAGE('/resource/ActvityStatusKPI/Green.gif', 'Current'),'N/A' )))
CustomField.label: Activity Status KPI
